page.title: 04TARRINGTON VILLAGE
page.content: In Tarrington there is a village hall,used for the playschool,Bingo and for meetings. Tarrington Shop is also the Post Office. The doctor's surgery has a waiting room with a fish tank and a room with a bed next to the doctor's room.There are magazines to read in the waiting room.He prescribes his own medicine. There is a Hotel called the Foley Arms.You can play snooker there.You can have your drinks sitting on the bench outside. A Main Road,A438,goes through the village from Ledbury to Hereford. There is bus shelter down by the bench made of bricks and stone. The village has a telephone kiosk and a postbox.
